==== test.js (3 errors) ====
    import * as moment from 'moment';
                            ~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2307: Cannot find module 'moment' or its corresponding type declarations.
    import rollupMoment__default from 'moment';
                                      ~~~~~~~~

    export const moment = rollupMoment__default || moment;
                                                   ~~~~~~
